publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7223 Robin Harper: Statutory Employment Rights for Cultural Coordinatorsâ€”That the Parliament is concerned that certain local authorities in Scotland are denying culture coordinators their statutory rights to redundancy payments and abrogating other rights under employment law on termination of their contracts; notes that Unison and the Employee Assistance Programme are of the opinion that rights are being denied, and urges the Scottish Government to consult with COSLA as a matter of extreme urgency with a view to resolving this most unfortunate situation.
S3M-7223 Statutory Employment Rights for Cultural Coordinators (lodged on 15 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7223 Statutory Employment Rights for Cultural Coordinators (lodged on 15 October 2010) Malcolm Chisholm*, Bill Wilson*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-7223 Statutory Employment Rights for Cultural Coordinators (lodged on 15 October 2010) Patrick Harvie*
